text:
Aww yeah! What's going on guys? You asked for 
it, so we made it for you! Vocabulary related

to politics! So this is absolutely fantastic 
because it can help you to understand the news

elections, and even political tv 
series and movies! Now, as always,

we will be teaching you with different clips from 
some of your favorite shows! Before we get into

any of that I want to let you know that if you are 
new here, every single week we make fun lessons

just like this one, so that you can understand 
fast speaking natives! Without getting lost,

without missing the jokes, and without 
subtitles! Just like our fan Rekarin,

who is a teacher and says she loves 
using our lessons with her students.

All right! So before we move on to 
the next part: "All about government",

I wanted to let you know that having the 
right vocabulary is absolutely essential

to being able to understand fast speech. Just 
like if you want to watch the news, you need

to know the right words to be able to understand 
that context. Well that's why in our Fluent with

Friends Course we teach you thousands of words 
that natives use every single day, which is going

to help you a lot in being able to understand us 
no matter how fast we speak! Well, do you want

to try it? You can do it absolutely free with 
our three-part Masterclass! It's really simple,

just click up here or down description below and 
you can learn more and sign up for that right now!
